sense.def:
Z izrazom
his
povemo, da nekaj pripada ali je povezano z moškim, dečkom ali živalskim samcem, ki je bil že omenjen, ali pa se nanaša na osebo, katere spol ni znan ali izražen.

seg.quote: He had his hands in his pockets.
To each according to his need.
Willie had a job on a magazine that a friend of his had just started.

sense.def:
His
uporabljamo tudi v nazivih, kadar govorimo o moškem.
